verses.name: Numbers 9:10
verses.text: Speak unto the children of Israel, saying, If any man of you or of your posterity shall be unclean by reason of a dead body, or be in a journey afar off, yet he shall keep the passover unto the Lord.

verses.name: Numbers 9:11
verses.text: The fourteenth day of the second month at even they shall keep it, and eat it with unleavened bread and bitter herbs.

verses.name: Numbers 9:12
verses.text: They shall leave none of it unto the morning, nor break any bone of it: according to all the ordinances of the passover they shall keep it.
